alert.note: Alert for Jefferson (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 5:11PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Jefferson County through 545 PM CDT... At 511 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Fultondale. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Northern Birmingham, Gardendale, Fultondale, Tarrant, Ketona Lakes, Forestdale, Danville and New Castle. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
